item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, May 24, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Sunak suffers series of setbacks on first day of UK election campaign
2. Ray Dalio joins billionaires snapping up Singapore ‘shophouses’
3. Starwood limits redemptions in struggling $10bn property fund
4. [Opinion] America must face reality and prioritise China over Europe
5. Copper price to rocket to $40,000 a tonne, says top trader Andurand
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, May 24, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
